returns.lateFee: The amount of late fees owed.
returns.total: Full amount owed, combining principal plus interested.

callLoan(uint256).details: Only the "borrower" of the loan may elect this option.

params.id: The loan to pay off early.

params.DAO: The administrator of this contract (intended to be ZivoeDAO).
params._GBL: The yield distribution locker that collects and distributes capital for this OCC locker.
params._stablecoin: The stablecoin for this OCC contract.
params._underwriter: The entity that is allowed to call fundLoan() and markRepaid().

params.data: The data retrieved from 1inch API in order to execute the swap.

loanInfo(uint256).details: Refer to documentation on Loan struct for return param information.

returns.details: The remaining details of the loan:                  details[0] = principalOwed                  details[1] = APR                  details[2] = APRLateFee                  details[3] = paymentDueBy                  details[4] = paymentsRemaining                  details[5] = term                  details[6] = paymentInterval                  details[7] = requestExpiry                  details[8] = gracePeriod                  details[9] = loanState
returns.paymentSchedule: The structure of the payment schedule.

makePayment(uint256).details: Anyone is allowed to make a payment on someone's loan.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

processPayment(uint256).details: Anyone is allowed to process a payment, it will take from "borrower".Only allowed to call this if block.timestamp > paymentDueBy.

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

params.amounts: The amounts of "assets" to migrate, corresponds to "assets" by position in array.

params.ids: The IDs of the assets within the ERC1155 to migrate.

params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT to migrate.

params.amounts: The amounts of "assets" to migrate, corresponds to "assets" by position in array.

params.tokenIds: The IDs of the NFTs to migrate.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.APR: The annualized percentage rate charged on the outstanding principal.
params.APRLateFee: The annualized percentage rate charged on the outstanding principal (in addition to APR) for late payments.
params.borrowAmount: The amount to borrow (in other words, initial principal).
params.borrower: The address to borrow (that receives the loan).
params.gracePeriod: The amount of time (in seconds) the borrower has to makePayment() before loan could default.
params.paymentInterval: The interval of time between payments (in seconds).
params.term: The term or "duration" of the loan (this is the number of paymentIntervals that will occur, i.e. 10, 52, 200).

params.amount: The amount of principal to pay down.
The amount of interest to supply.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferOwnershipAndLock(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

amountOwed(uint256).notice: Returns information for amount owed on next payment of a particular loan.

callLoan(uint256).notice: Pays off the loan in full, plus additional interest for paymentInterval.

canPull().notice: Permission for owner to call pullFromLocker().

canPullMulti().notice: Permission for owner to call pullFromLockerMulti().

canPullMultiPartial().notice: Permission for owner to call pullFromLockerMultiPartial().

canPullPartial().notice: Permission for owner to call pushToLockerPartial().

canPush().notice: Permission for owner to call pushToLocker().

canPushMulti().notice: Permission for owner to call pushToLockerMulti().

forwardInterestKeeper(bytes).notice: This function converts and forwards available "amountForConversion" to YDL.distributeAsset().

loanInfo(uint256).notice: Returns information for a given loan.

makePayment(uint256).notice: Make a payment on a loan.

markDefault(uint256).notice: Mark a loan insolvent if a payment hasn't been made for over 90 days.

markRepaid(uint256).notice: Underwriter specifies a loan has been repaid fully via interest deposits in terms of off-chain debt.

processPayment(uint256).notice: Process a payment for a loan, on behalf of another borrower.

pullFromLocker(address).notice: Migrates entire ERC20 balance from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerERC721(address,uint256,byt.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMulti(address[]).notice: Migrates full amount of ERC20s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint.notice: Migrates ERC721s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerMultiPartial(address[],uin.notice: Migrates specific amounts of ERC20s from locker to owner().

pullFromLockerPartial(address,uint256).notice: Migrates specific amount of ERC20 from locker to owner().

pushToLocker(address,uint256).notice: Migrates specific amount of ERC20 from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerERC1155(address,uint256[],ui.notice: Migrates ERC1155 assets from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerERC721(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Migrates an ERC721 from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerMulti(address[],uint256[]).notice: Migrates specific amounts of ERC20s from owner() to locker.

pushToLockerMultiERC721(address[],uint25.notice: Migrates ERC721s from owner() to locker.

resolveDefault(uint256,uint256).notice: Make a full (or partial) payment to resolve a insolvent loan.

supplyInterest(uint256,uint256).notice: Supply interest to a repaid loan (for arbitrary interest repayment).

@notice  OCC stands for "On-Chain Credit".
          A "balloon" loan is an interest-only loan, with principal repaid in full at the end.
          An "amortized" loan is a principal and interest loan, with consistent payments until fully "Repaid".
          This locker is responsible for handling accounting of loans.
          This locker is responsible for handling payments and distribution of payments.
          This locker is responsible for handling defaults and liquidations (if needed).
